126  struct BallAndSocketJointComponent {

129  decimal coneLimitHalfAngle;

133  : isConeLimitEnabled(isConeLimitEnabled), coneLimitHalfAngle(coneLimitHalfAngle) {
134 
135  }
136  };

250 
251 // Return a pointer to a given joint
252 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE BallAndSocketJoint* BallAndSocketJointComponents::getJoint(Entity jointEntity) const {
253 
254  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
255  return mJoints[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]];
256 }
257 
258 // Set the joint pointer to a given joint
259 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void BallAndSocketJointComponents::setJoint(Entity jointEntity, BallAndSocketJoint* joint) const {
260 
261  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
262  mJoints[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]] = joint;
263 }
264 
265 // Return the local anchor point of body 1 for a given joint
266 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE const Vector3& BallAndSocketJointComponents::getLocalAnchorPointBody1(Entity jointEntity) const {
267 
268  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
269  return mLocalAnchorPointBody1[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]];
270 }
271 
272 // Set the local anchor point of body 1 for a given joint
273 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void BallAndSocketJointComponents::setLocalAnchorPointBody1(Entity jointEntity, const Vector3& localAnchoirPointBody1) {
274 
275  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
276  mLocalAnchorPointBody1[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]] = localAnchoirPointBody1;
277 }
278

393

395  return mIsConeLimitEnabled[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]];
396 }
